set_proxy_env() { # Get proxy settings from System Preferences local enabled=$(scutil --proxy | grep "$1Enable" | awk '{print $3}') local host=$(scutil --proxy | grep "$1Proxy" | awk '{print $3}') local port=$(scutil --proxy | grep "$1Port" | awk '{print $3}')
if [ "$enabled" = "1" ] && [ -n "$host" ] then if [ -z "$port" ] then port=$3 fi
if [ "$1" = "SOCKS" ] then launchctl setenv "$2" "socks://${host}:${port}" else launchctl setenv "$2" "http://${host}:${port}" fi else launchctl unsetenv "$2" fi }
set_proxy_env "HTTP" "HTTP_PROXY" "8080" set_proxy_env "HTTPS" "HTTPS_PROXY" "8080" set_proxy_env "FTP" "FTP_PROXY" "21" set_proxy_env "SOCKS" "SOCKS_PROXY" "1080"
EXCEPTIONS=$(scutil --proxy | grep "ExceptionsList" -A 50 | grep -E "^\s+[0-9]+" | awk '{print $3}' | tr '\n' ',' | sed 's/,$//') if [ -n "$EXCEPTIONS" ] then launchctl setenv "NO_PROXY" "$EXCEPTIONS" else launchctl unsetenv "NO_PROXY" fi
